description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini & Haloumi Fritters With Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury fritter,Pescatarian,Zucchini,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Tomato,Sesame free
name: Zucchini & Haloumi Fritters With Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, juiced and finely grated rind

recipeInstructions.text: Combine zucchini, halloumi, onions and mint in a large bowl. Combine flour and baking powder in a bowl and add to vegetable mixture. Whisk eggs, 1/2 lemon rind and 1 tbs juice in a jug. Add to zucchini mixture with salt and pepper. Stir until combined.

Preheat oven to 150Â°C. Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add 1/4 cups of zucchini mixture to pan, forming into round fritters. Cook for 3 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a tray and place in oven to keep warm. Repeat with remaining zucchini mixture.
Combine remaining lemon rind, remaining lemon juice and aioli in a bowl.
Combine tomato, rocket, oil, salt and pepper in a bowl. Serve fritters with lemon aioli and tomato salad.
